controller.groovebox

Interface GrooveBoxPlayer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Loopable, Observable, Player
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GrooveBoxController

    public interface GrooveBoxPlayer
extends Player, Loopable, Observable
    This rappresent the logic to manage a groove and reproduce them with groove box
    Author:
    Matteo Gabellini

    • Method Detail

      • saveTrack

        boolean saveTrack(java.lang.String pathName)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Save the midi file of the created Groove
        Parameters:
        path - specify where the midi file will be saved, the last word of the path is the name of the file
        Returns:
        true if the file was saved otherwise false
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

        boolean getCellState(int rowIndex,
                     int columnIndex)
        Take the state of a cell
        Parameters:
        rowIndex - the index of the Groove table row
        columnIndex - the index of the Groove table column
        Returns:
        true if the cell is active otherwise false
